arts.ttl: 'I never should have left Man Utd to join Chelsea - I still regret it'
arts.sum: Juan Sebastian Veron left Manchester United for Chelsea in 2003, but the Argentine midfielder's time in west London lasted just a matter of months

arts.ttl: Manchester United vs Chelsea – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim is under immense pressure as his Manchester United side host Chelsea in a season-defining fixture on Saturday. A dreadful start to the campaign has left the Red Devils in the bottom half of the table. They are desperate for a big result against a top rival to turn their season around. arts.ttl: Chelsea XI vs Manchester United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca takes his unbeaten Chelsea side to Old Trafford on Saturday, looking to continue their strong start to the Premier League season. The Blues will be aiming to secure back-to-back league victories over Manchester United for the first time since 2011, a result that would be a major statement of their title intentions. arts.sum: Old Trafford stages a marquee Premier League fixture on Saturday as a Manchester United side in crisis host unbeaten Chelsea. The match pits two clubs in contrasting form against each other. arts.sum: “It's always difficult to play Man United away in their stadium Old Trafford . Man United are under pressure to bounce back from a derby day defeat, and the Italian "appreciates" the situation they face.
